mapper.insert:
select notiNo_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice(notiNo, notiTitle, empNo, notiContent, notiRegdate, notiNo, notiFilename, notiFilesize, notiOfilename, notiDowncnt, notiReadcnt) values(#{notiNo}, #{notiTitle}, #{empNo}, #{notiContent}, #{notiRegdate}, #{notiNo}, #{notiFilename},#{notiFilesize}, #{notiOfilename}, #{notiDowncnt}, #{noti_readcnt})
